body.name: Dove Advanced Care Antiperspirant Cool Essentials 4 Count Deodorant for Women For 48 Hour Protection And Soft And Comfortable Underarms 2.6 oz
body.couponInfo: Save an extra 20% on your first Subscribe and Save order.
features: Effective protection and skin kind to skin: Dove Advanced Care Cool Essentials Antiperspirant Deodorant Stick keeps your underarms dry and odor-free for up to 48 hours while being kind to your skin
Soft and comfortable underarms: Our antiperspirant deodorant for women, containing 1/4 moisturizers with natural oil, cares for your underarm skin
Alcohol-free formula: The 0 percent alcohol (ethanol) formula of our antiperspirant stick helps skin recover from underarm irritation that shaving can cause
Keeps you fresh: This deodorant comes in a nature-inspired scent with crisp cucumber, juicy pear and honeydew melon blended with green tea
Frees you from underarm worries: This deodorant for women protects and cares for your skin so that you can be free from underarm inhibitions and live beautifully unconsciously
Certified cruelty free: Globally, Dove deodorant does not test on animals and is certified cruelty-free by PETA
body.description: Infused with the fresh fragrance of crisp cucumber and honeydew melon blended with green tea, Dove Advanced Care Cool Essentials Antiperspirant deodorant.Stick is perfect if you’re looking for a long-lasting, invigorating, and fresh scent. It's also a great choice if you're looking for a deodorant.for sensitive skin. With an alcohol-free formula that’s kind to skin, this deodorant.helps to relieve the irritation that shaving can cause. Dove antiperspirant deodorant. enriched with our signature 1/4 moisturizers with natural oil, cares for your delicate underarm skin – leaving your underarms.feeling healthy and protected. As much as it cares for your skin, this deodorant.for women doesn’t compromise on effective antiperspirant protection. Keeping you fresh, this gentle deodorant.protects from sweat and odor for up to 48 hours. For best results, apply this Dove antiperspirant deodorant.to dry skin after showering and enjoy fresh, comfortably dry skin from morning to night. Dove is certified cruelty-free by PETA because we believe that real beauty is cruelty-free. We’re on a mission to help women raise their self-esteem – because we believe beauty should be a source of confidence, not anxiety. Dove Antiperspirant deodorant. deliver effective underarm protection and are kind to skin, so women can be free of underarm inhibitions and live beautifully unselfconsciously.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Effective Protection Dove knows that underarm skin needs kindness as well as protection. That’s why our antiperspirant deodorant gives you up to 48 hours of sweat and odor protection so you can stay cool and dry all day long. Kind to Skin Enriched with our signature 1/4 moisturizers with natural oil, the alcohol-free formula of this antiperspirant deodorant works to nourish your delicate underarm skin, leaving you with soft and more comfortable underarms. Cool Refreshing Fragrance Dove Advance Care Cool Essentials fragrance has a cool refreshing aroma, with vibrant notes of green tea, cucumber, melon, combined with green apple and jasmine, layered over notes of sandalwood. Certified Cruelty-Free Since 2018, Dove has been globally accredited "Cruelty-Free" by the animal rights organization PETA (People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals) in recognition of the Dove global commitment to permanently end tests on animals everywhere in the world.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle Effective Protection
reviews.reviewText: Excellent for my sensitive skin. Light pleasant scent. Guards well against perspiration. Great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells good, works well, no white marks on clothes
reviews.reviewText: I struggle with excessive sweating due to medication. I tried other brands that say they're clinical strength antiperspirant, but they really didn't work because my pits still felt wet. This dove antiperspirant works great and keeps my underarms dry all day! It smells really good and doesn't leave any white marks on my clothes. With other brands, I've had to use extra just to still feel wetness, and they leave nasty marks on my bras, but this dove only needs a thin layer to work effectively and doesn't leave marks on my clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: One of my favorite scents. Nice and refreshing. Isn’t irritating for sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does The Job
reviews.reviewText: I used another brand in a gel for many years. My last purchase just didn't work. Something was off with the scent and that was the start of me looking for something else. This Dove had a lot of really good reviews. I decided to give it a try and using a solid for the first time in many, many years was really stepping out of my comfort zone. The scent is nice but not heavy and doesn't linger. It definitely does the job when I get stressed or do exercise. I am so happy I gave this product a try.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have very sensitive skin and Dove cucumber deodorant has been a life saver! This has been the only deodorant I have not gotten a skin reaction from. I have tried many brands, so this was a huge relief! I have been using this deodorant for years and it gives you the protection! Buying in store each can be $7, so I really love the value. Once I found this, I haven’t gotten it in the store since!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No more odor
reviews.reviewText: This deodorant is great. It smells great and is great before or after working out or sweating. It's also nice for after a shower or before bed. It is amazing at covering the smell and is overall a great deodorant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works well, smells good, good value for the price. These last me forever. I've never had any issues with them. I typically sweat a lot and these seem to combat that.

Excelente servicio, llego antes de lo esperado. Es mi primera vez con este aroma porque siempre uso el de coco, sin embargo este huele muy bien y la fórmula advanced care de dove es de lo mejor, lo recomeindo ampliamente.
It’s a great product and spells so good
